loans.name: Hak

texts.en: Hak L. resides with her family in Kampong Cham province, Cambodia, an area known for rubber plantation. L. is a farmer, earning an income of USD 2 per day. Her husband  is a play instructor, earning an income of USD 10 per day. Each month, the family has to spend USD 83 on food and USD 85 on the other necessary expenses. L. is requesting a loan of USD 750 to purchase an generator to light the stage when her husband has a show. In the future, she would like to use the additional income to repair her house. This will be her first loan from CREDIT, a L. standing Kiva partner.

loans.use: To buy a generator

loans.name: Ma. Jonalyn

texts.en:
Ma. Jonalyn is a married woman who lives in Moises Padilla, Negros Occidental.  She earns her living by operating three business ventures: School Supplies, Grinding Services and Plastic Wares.  Her husband Fernando, who is 42 years old, works as a vendor to earn his living and helps in his wife's business activities. They have two children who are 10 and 14 years old. Ma. Jonalyn joined NWTF-Project Dungganon in 2000 because she aspired for something better for her family. With the help of her past 16 loans from NWTF-Project Dungganon, Ma. Jonalyn has been incrementally lifting her family out of poverty by the sweat of her brow. Her previous loan of PHP 29,500 helped her earn a monthly profit of PHP 7,000, thus uplifting the family's standard of living. This time, for her 17th loan, she is borrowing PHP 29,500 to use as additional working capital so that she can continue to save for the future education of her children. Ma. Jonalyn is a Dungganon woman who is following an honorable path toward the achievement of her dreams.  

About NWTF:  In a world full of challenges, Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation (NWTF) is making a difference in the lives of thousands of women through Project Dungganon (a Hiligaynon word that means Honorable). Through the alleviation program, NWTF is empowering these women to progress from earning less than $1 a day to achieving realities that surpass even their dreams. They have taken a life path that will ultimately make them Dungganon - a title of esteem that is bestowed upon a member of a community who has earned the respect through a lifetime of hard and honest work.  Help NWTF continue its mission to help the poorest in the Philippines by joining the NWTF Kiva lending team at http://www.kiva.org

loans.use: Additional working capital

loans.name: Marigold

texts.en:
Marigold is a married woman who lives in Cadiz City, Negros Occidental. She earns her living by operating a sari-sari (general) store.  Her husband Edgardo, who is 33 years old, works as a driver to earn his living and helps in his wife's business activities. They have four children who are 8 to 12 years old. Marigold joined NWTF-Project Dungganon in 2007 because she aspired for something better for her family. With the help of her past eight loans from NWTF-Project Dungganon, Marigold has been incrementally lifting her family out of poverty by the sweat of her brow. Her previous loan of PHP 21,000 helped her earn a monthly profit of PHP 4,000, thus uplifting the family's standard of living.  This time, for her ninth loan, she is borrowing PHP 25,000 to purchase more stock to sell so that she can continue to save up for their future, for their daily needs & for the education of their children.  Marigold is a Dungganon woman who is following an honorable path toward the achievement of her dreams. 

About NWTF:  In a world full of challenges, Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation (NWTF) is making a difference in the lives of thousands of women through Project Dungganon (a Hiligaynon word that means Honorable). Through the alleviation program, NWTF is empowering these women to progress from earning less than $1 a day to achieving realities that surpass even their dreams. They have taken a life path that will ultimately make them Dungganon - a title of esteem that is bestowed upon a member of a community who has earned the respect through a lifetime of hard and honest work.  Help NWTF continue its mission to help the poorest in the Philippines by joining the NWTF Kiva lending team at http://www.kiva.org.

loans.use: To purchase more stock to sell

loans.name: Guillermo

texts.es: El señor Guillermo se dedica a la cría de ganado lechero  y es productor lechero cuya producción la venda a la planta industrializadora de leche PIL;es crédito lo requiere para comprar un par de vacas lecheras para incrementar su producción de leche; su esposa le ayuda con las actividades agrícolas, tienen tres hijos   y ambas actividades son la fuente de ingresos que tiene para cubrir gastos de su familia. Vive  en casa  propia ubicada en la Localidad de Tipampa en la Provincia Omasuyos del departamento de La Paz. El cliente se encuentra satisfecho con los créditos que se le otorgaron anteriormente desde el año  2007.
texts.en: Guillermo works raising milk cows and producing milk. He sells his milk to the industrial plant called PIL. He needs this loan to buy a pair of milk cows and increase his milk production. His wife helps him with the agricultural work and these activities are their source of income for covering the family expenses. They have three children. He lives in his own house in Tipampa in the Omasuyos province of the department of La Paz. The client is satisfied with the credits that have been granted to him since 2007.

loans.use: To buy a pair of milk cows to increase his milk production.

loans.name: Layali Ida

texts.es: La señorita Layali Ida G. F.  se dedica al alquiler de auto siempre se a caracterizado por ser una persona responsable y trabajadora también tiene otros ingresos eventuales como secretaria, el automóvil lo adquirió con una herencia que le corresponde por parte de sus padres ella es soltera no tiene hijos y vive en casa de su madrina  a la cual también ayuda con sus gastos de casa .Requiere el préstamo para darle mantenimiento  a  su unidad de transporte para brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes.
texts.en: Señorita Layali Ida G. F. owns a car rental business. She is known for her responsibility and hard work. She has another income, since she works also as a secretary. She bought her car with funds inherited from her parents. She is single without children and lives with her godmother. She participates in household expenses. She applies for a loan to service her car and provide a better service to her customers.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Racheal

texts.en:
Rachael is a married woman with four children, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family. 

She has operated a firewood selling business for the past three years, selling to her local residents. Rachael faces a major challenge with the high cost of transportation in her business. She hopes to establish a wholesale shop in the future. 

With the Kshs 30,000 she wants to purchase bundles of firewood to sell. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: To purchase bundles of firewood for sale.

loans.name: Dioselina

texts.es: Dioselina, es una valerosa madre soltera de 39 años, trabaja y vive para sacar adelante a sus 3 hijos, a los que cría en su casa propia, ubicada en la ciudad de La Merced (selva central peruana). Hace 6 meses que comenzó un negocio de venta de accesorios para dormitorio como: sábanas, toallas, cubrecamas, y demás prendas que son confeccionadas por ella misma, gracias a la máquina de coser que tiene. Con su práctica constante, y sus buenos diseños adquirió muy pronto clientes, los que la buscan para comprar sus costuras, por ello más adelante desea abrir un taller, equipado, con una razón social para poder ser conocida, y obtener mejores ganancias. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Las Optimistas”, y este es el primer crédito que tiene con MFP, donde está segura, podrá concretizar sus objetivos. Dioselina, para comenzar con mucho éxito su taller, comprará con crédito telas de diversos colores y texturas, con ello comenzará con la confección de prendas para dormitorio.
texts.en: Dioselina is a brave, 39-year old single mother.  She works and lives to get her three children ahead in life, raising them in a house that she owns located in the city of La Merced in the central Peruvian jungle.  Six months ago, she started a business selling bedroom accessories like sheets, towels, bedspreads and other items that she makes herself thanks to the sewing machine she has.  With her constant practice and good designs, she acquired customers quickly who seek her out to buy her items.  This is why she wants to open a workshop in the future and be well-known and earn more.  She belongs to Las Optimistas Communal Bank and this is her first loan with MFP, where she is sure that she will be able to meet her goals.  To open her workshop successfully, Dioselina will use the loan to purchase fabrics of different colors and textures to begin making bedroom items.

loans.use: To buy fabrics for making sheets and towels

loans.name: Rosalie

texts.en:
Rosalie is a 30-year-old married woman who supports her family by operating a sari-sari (general) store.  She lives in Cadiz City, Negros Occidental. She has been a member of NWTF-Project Dungganon since 2006 and has improved her living conditions with the help of her loans from NWTF and through her own efforts. By working hard in her general store business, she is gradually making her family more economically stable.  She now earns an average monthly income of PHP 5,000.  Rosalie is borrowing PHP 23,000 so that she can continue to fund her business operations. This will be her 26th loan from NWTF-Project Dungganon.  Her previous loan of PHP 25,000, which she paid off well within its term, was just another step in her journey toward economic freedom. Rosalie aspires to elevate her family's living conditions and ensure their future wellbeing by following the Dungganon way.  

About NWTF:  In a world full of challenges, Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation (NWTF) is making a difference in the lives of thousands of women through Project Dungganon (a Hiligaynon word that means Honorable). Through the alleviation program, NWTF is empowering these women to progress from earning less than $1 a day to achieving realities that surpass even their dreams. They have taken a life path that will ultimately make them Dungganon - a title of esteem that is bestowed upon a member of a community who has earned the respect through a lifetime of hard and honest work.  Help NWTF continue its mission to help the poorest in the Philippines by joining the NWTF Kiva lending team at http://www.kiva.org

loans.use: To fund her business operations

loans.name: Celia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “CAPAC QOYA”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito D. Qoya, provincia D. Calca, Departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Celia; La socia tiene 77 años D. edad, la socia  es viudad; la socia  trabaja  administrando sus terrenos D. cultivo y elaborando chompas, ella produce chompas al por mayor y las venD. D. forma independiente y según sea la demanda, ella cultiva en sus tierras maíz, trigo, papa, ella levantó su cultivo D. maíz y requiere abonar sus terrenos y remover la tierra con tractores, ella para esto necesita alquilar un tractor y comprar abono para preparar el terreno para la siguiente siembra, la socia desea el crédito para comprar semillas para la nueva siembra, preparar el terreno, abono, e ir mejorando su vivienda poco a  poco.

La socia está feliz con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago D. sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the “CAPAC QOYA” community bank. This bank is located in the district of Qoya, province of Calca, departament of Cuzco.

The member is Celia. She is 77 years old. She is a widow and works managing her crop land and making sweaters. She produces the sweaters wholesale and sells them according to the demand. On her land she grows corn, wheat, and potatoes. She harvested her corn crop and need to fertilize her land and move the dirt with tractors. For this, she needs to rent a tractor and buy fertilizer to prepare the land for the next planting. She wants the land to buy seed for the new planting, to prepare the land, for fertilizer and to improve her housing little by little.  

The member is happy with the loan that has been given to her and is committed to making the payments according to the established schedule.

loans.use: To invest in preparing the land, buying fertilizer.

loans.name: Hanny

texts.en:
Hanny, a married woman with four children, all of whom attend school, owns a house that has piped water but no electricity. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

Hanny has operated a dry fish-selling business for the past three years, selling at the market to her neighbours. In addition, she sells green vegetables. Hanny faces a major challenge of competition from other vegetable stall operators. With the Kshs 30,000 loan, she wants to purchase sacks of dry fish for sale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: To purchase sacks of dry fish for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To make and sell clothing

loans.name: German Antonio

texts.es: German Antonio tiene 58 años, su actividad es brindar el servicio de transporte y billar. El se siente muy contento pues no la primera experiencia que ha obtenido el siempre ha sido una persona muy emprendedora y disfruta de este trabajo. El financiamiento es para realizar ciertas reparaciones a su vehículo, el siempre se preocupa por brindar un buen servicio. German tiene los sueños cambiar su medio de transporte, pero debido a ciertas dificultades no ha podido realizarlas, pues el siempre está pendiente de lo que su familia necesita.
texts.en:
Germán Antonio, 58, provides public transportation services and has a pool hall.  He is very happy because this isn’t his first experience he’s had and he has always been a very enterprising person and enjoys his work.

The loan is to make certain repairs to his vehicle which due to some difficulties he’s been unable to do; he’s always watchful of his family’s needs.

loans.use: For vehicle repair.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es: Elizabeth, de 53 años, es una madre de familia responsable y muy activa. Vive en su casa propia en compañía de su esposo Marcos, y sus 3 hijos de los siete que son en total. Desde ha 10 años Elizabeth, se dedica a la venta de productos perecibles, en su bodega situado en el primer ambiente de su casa. Asimismo vende productos de belleza mucho más antes que su bodega,  y le va bien en ambas actividades, por lo que se siente motivada de seguir trabajando. Le gusta dedicarle todo su tiempo a sus negocios, ya que gracias a sus utilidades ayudo cubrir  la educación de sus hijos mayores, que hoy son profesionales y, solo le falta educar a los tres últimos. Es por ello,  que esta emprendedora madre de familia trabaja con mucha responsabilidad, y sabe que cuenta con la ayuda de ustedes y; eso es su mayor seguridad, por  lo que esta convencida de continuar construyendo su segundo piso de su casa y brindar la educación superior a todos sus hijos. Es su segundo crédito individual que tiene con MFP, y promete pagar puntualmente sus cuotas, pues no quiere defraudar a todas las personas que hicieron posible este aporte que le permitirá continuar trabajando en busca del progreso. Elizabeth, cada fin de semana invierte en mercadería comestibles para su negocio, por ello con el crédito que solicita, comprará arroz, fideos y aceites al por mayor. Asimismo, cemento y arena para terminar con la construcción de su casa.
texts.en:
Elizabeth, 53, is a responsible, very active mother.  She lives in her own house in the company of her husband, Marcos, and three of their seven children.  For the last 10 years Elizabeth has sold perishables in her grocery store located at home.  She has also sold beauty products from even before her grocery store.  She does well in both activities so feels very motivated to continue working.  She likes dedicating all her time to her businesses because thanks to the profits from them she was able to pay for her older children’s education, who are now professionals; she only still has the last three to go.  Because of this, this enterprising mother works with much responsibility and knows that she can count on your support and that’s her greatest security.  She is, therefore, convinced that she can continue building a second story on her house and provide higher education to all her children.

This is her second loan with MFP and she promises to pay all her installments on time because she does not want to disappoint all the people who made the loan possible that will allow her to stay in business seeking progress.

Elizabeth invests in food items weekly for her business so will use the requested loan to buy rice, noodles and oil at wholesale.  She will also buy cement and sand to finish building her house.

loans.use: To buy stock items for her store as well as cement and sand to finish building her house.

loans.name: Graciela

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “CAPAC QOYA”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito de Qoya, provincia de Calca, Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Graciela La socia tiene 45 años de edad, la socia  es casada; la socia tiene 3 hijos 22,15,7 años; la socia trabaja administrando su bar restaurante, la socia tiene un restaurante es el único en el pueblo de Coya, ella trabaja con dos ayudantes y preparan todo tipo de platos caseros, desde el tradicional choclo con queso hasta los más elaborados, ella también vende cervezas y gaseosas a partir de las 7 de la noche y en poca cantidad. La socia solicita el préstamo para poder invertir ene la compra de insumos y mejorar su establecimiento y abastecerse de bebidas, ella trae todo desde la ciudad del Cusco y esta ubicada a una hora desde Cusco.

La socia está feliz con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the “CAPAC QOYA” community bank. This bank is located in the district of Qoya, province of Calca, departament of Cuzco.

The member is Graciela. She is 45 years old, married and has 3 children who are 22, 15 and 7 years old. She works managing her bar-restaurant. She has a restaurant which is the only one in the town of Coya. She works with two assistants and they make all kinds of homemade dishes, from the traditional corn and cheese to more complicated ones. She also sells beer and soft drinks from 7 p.m. on and in small quantities. The member is asking for the loan to invest in buying materials and in improving her establishment and buying a supply of beverages. She brings everything from the city of Cuzco, one hour away.  

The member is happy with the loan and is committed to making the payments according to the established schedule.

loans.use: To invest in buying materials for the restaurant.

loans.name: Felipe

texts.es:
Felipe es chofer y trabaja en el sindicato de Transportes Laja ocupando el cargo de secretario general en dicho sindicato; su esposa tiene un puesto de venta de salteñas tucumanas (en ingles  es turnovers), el crédito lo quiere para comprar aceite, harina, condimentos y demás para continuar elaborando las mismas. Es su principal fuente de ingreso para su manutención de su familia.
Vive  en anticrético  ubicado en la zona de villa Tunari de la ciudad de El Alto, tiene cuatro hijos. El cliente se encuentra muy satisfecho con los créditos que se le otorgaron.
texts.en:
Felipe is a driver and works as General Secretary of the Laja Transportation Syndicate.  His wife has a stand selling Tucuman style salteñas (turnovers).  He wants the loan to buy oil, flour, condiments and other ingredients to continue making them.  This is his main source of income for family support.

He lives under the anticrético modality (a transaction whereby a property owner requests a "loan" from you in exchange for housing, which must be paid back to you at the end of your contract) in El Alto’s Villa Tunari area.  He has four children.  He is very satisfied with the loans he’s been granted.

loans.use: To buy oil, flour, condiments and other ingredients to continue making salteñas (turnovers).

loans.name: Renacer De San Francisco Group

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Paraguarí se reunieron unas mujeres con el fin de  capitalizar su actividad y otras para emprender actividades productivas, de ahí que el programa les resultó muy fructífero e interesante por los beneficios brindados.
El comité lleva por nombre Renacer de San Francisco, actualmente se encuentran en el segundo ciclo con calificación excelente, integrada por 16 emprendedoras señoras, quienes ponen lo mejor de si para aumentar sus ingresos.
La sra. Juana es la presidenta del comité y ella se dedica a la venta de comidas y bebidas en un pequeño puesto en el mecado de su ciudad, muchas acuden allí para el almuerzo principalmente pues no se pueden ir para tal cosa a sus casas.
texts.en:
A group of women meet in the city of Paraguarí in order to capitalize on their work and to undertake productive activities, and their group is very fruitful and interesting because of the benefits that it offers them. 
The committee is called "Renacer de San Francisco", and they are currently in their second loan cycle and have an excellent rating. The group is composed of 16 enterprising women who put their best into increasing their income.
Juana is the president of the committee and she sells food and drinks from a little stall in the market of her city. Many people go there for lunch if they can't have lunch at home.

loans.use: To buy drinks, flour, sugar, dairy products, etc.

loans.name: Safia's Group

texts.en:
Safia, a 40-year-old seamstress who also discharges her responsibilities as a housewife, lives with her family in a four-room brick house in Faisalabad, an area well known for its textile industry. Her house is located in Yaseenabad, where she has lived for 15 years. The mother of a son and three daughters, all attending a local school, Safia knows the importance of education and therefore wants them to complete it and become successful in life.

In order to financially support her husband, Safia stitches clothes for her community members. She is very good at her work, and the community ladies prefer using her services because she offers them good quality at reasonable rates.

Safia is married to M. A., who runs a grocery store in the market. Through his shop he sells daily-use items such as cooking oil, soaps, sugar, lentils, spices, etc. He charges very reasonable rates for his items, thereby generating good sales volumes every month.

Safia has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for the improvement of her husband’s business. With the loan, he will buy groceries in bulk to sell. She is hopeful that he will achieve good outcomes from the loan and his income will further improve.

A regular loan user of Asasah, this is Safia's fourth loan application. In previous loan years, she has maintained good credit behavior and attended all meetings.

loans.use: To buy groceries for grocery store business

loans.name: Mario Alberto

texts.es: Mario Alberto tiene su negocio que es la venta comida. Tiene más de 17 años en este negocio, la ubicación de su negocio es en su vivienda. El inicio este medio de vida por la necesidad de tener un empleo que le genere ingresos a su hogar.  El ofrece el mejor servicio a sus clientes, por lo que se siente muy contento de realizar lo que más le gusta. Esta no es la primera vez que realiza financiamientos ya que han sido de gran ayuda para su negocio. Mario solicita este crédito para la compra de arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, verduras entre otras cosas.
texts.en:
Mario Alberto sells food and has been in this business for more than 17 years. His business is located in his home. This business was started because he needed employment that could generate household income. Mario provides the best service to his customers and is very happy because he enjoys his job.

This is not the first time he has received financing since the funds have been a great help to his business. Mario is requesting this loan in order to buy rice, beans, sugar, oil, vegetables, and other items.

loans.use: Operating capital to buy rice, beans, sugar, oil, vegetables, and other items

loans.name: Maria Doraliza

texts.es:
Maria de 48 años, vende productos naturales para el cuerpo hechos con frutas. Hace  años atrás ella comenzó como vendedora de productos y haciendo promociones, (todos los vendedores son independientes).En la actualidad trabaja desde las 08h00am hasta que termine su labor. 

Para seguir trabajando y darle una mejor vida a su familia ella quiere comprar con el préstamo productos  como vitaminas. En el futuro quiere incrementa sus ventas.
texts.en:
Maria is 48 years old and sells natural body products made from fruit. Some years ago, she started selling these products and conducting promotions (all sales representatives are independent). She currently works from 8am until she finishes all of her duties.

To continue working and provide a better life for her family, Maria wants to use her loan to buy products such as vitamins. In the future, she wants to increase her sales.

loans.use: Purchase vitamins to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Pay for maintenance & purchase a gearbox for his vehicle

loans.name: Leonardo

texts.es:
El señor Leonardo vende y compra celulares y también es técnico en la reparación de los mismos; su esposa tiene un snack y se dedica a la venta de comida como ser almuerzos y platos variados. Con el dinero del crédito podrá comprar una conservadora y una freidora, que necesita urgentemente para su snack. Es su principal fuente de ingreso para la manutención de su familia.

Vive  en alquiler en una casa ubicada en la zona de Faro Murillo de la ciudad de El Alto, tiene un hijo. Es la primera vez que trabaja con IMPRO y con KIVA.
texts.en:
Sr. Leonardo buys and sells mobile phones and is also a technician who repairs these products. His wife manages a snack bar and sells food such as lunches and various dishes. The money from this loan will be used to purchase a refrigerator and a deep fryer because his wife needs these items immediately for her snack bar. This is the main source of income for supporting their family.

Leonardo lives in a rental home in the District of Faro Murillo in the city of El Alto. He has one child. This is his first loan with IMPRO and with Kiva.

loans.use: Purchase a refrigerator & a deep fryer for his wife's snack business

loans.name: Potey Andromagne Eurydice

texts.fr:
Jeune cliente de 26 ans, mariée et mère de 3 enfants dont l’âge varie entre 1 et 14 ans. Elle se lance dans la vente de la friperie  en 2005, quand elle constate que c’était difficile pour sa famille de  vivre avec le seul salaire de son époux.
Elle a des ventes minimales de 5000 fr et 40000frs quand elle a bien vendu.
A l’octroi de son prêt elle compte acheter des nouveaux ballots de pantalon, culotte et body.
Elle est décider de faire des bénéfices et  d’épargné pour pouvoir atteindre ses ambitions, à l’ avenir supporter la scolarité des ses enfants.
texts.en:
Young 26 year old client, married and mother of 3 children whose age varies between 1 and 14 years.

She launched out in the sale of the secondhand clotehes shop in 2005, when She saw that it was difficult for her family to live with only the wages of her husband. 

She has low sales of 5000 Fr and up to 40,000frs when she sold well. 

With the granting of her loan she intends to buy new bundles of pants, shorts, and pullovers. She  wants to profit and save to be able to reach her ambitions, in the future to support the schooling of her children.

loans.use: Purchase of bales of pullovers, shirts, sailor shirts, dresses, skirts

loans.name: Bertha Carmelina

texts.es: Bertha Carmelina T.: es de 45 años de edad tiene 2 hijos que estan en edad escolar, por quien trabaja todos los dias para el pago de su colejiatura,doña Bertha trabaja siendo comida,refacciones,en la ascuela de su comunidad,ella se levanta muy tenprano para hacer diferentes clases de comida se siente muy contenta porque a cresido consederable mente en su negocio ella solicita el credito para la compra de 3 tareas de leña y compra de productos comestibles para elavorar comida le da gracias a Dios por haber Conocido a FAPE por la manera en que ayuda a las personas por medio de creditos, y que hojala le pueda dar el apoyo que ella nececita por medio de su credito solicitado.
texts.en:
Bertha Carmelina Toho is 45 years old and has two school age children. She works every day in order to pay for their school fees. Bertha sells food and snacks at the school in her community. She wakes up very early so that she can prepare different types of food. Bertha is extremely pleased because her business has grown considerably.

She is requesting a loan so that she can buy three bundles of firewood and food products used for preparing snacks. Bertha thanks God that she had the chance to become acquainted with FAPE because the organization has helped many people by granting loans. She hopes her loan request will be granted so that she can receive the support she needs.

loans.use: Purchase three bundles of firewood and food products used for preparing snacks

loans.name: Irlanda Carolina

texts.es: Irlanda Carolina tiene 28 años, ella tiene un Kiosco. Tiene más de 6 años con este medio de vida, Irlanda se levanta muy temprano ya que diariamente viene a su negocio, pues la mayoría de sus clientes son niños cercanos a un colegio. Poco a poco fue incrementando su capital, por lo que no es la primera vez que realiza financiamientos. Este financiamiento es para la compra de golosinas, refrescos, pan, galletas, jugos, gaseosas entre otras cosas. Su sueño es que sus 3 hijos logren ser profesionales y realizarle ciertas mejoras a su vivienda.
texts.en:
Irlanda Carolina is 28 years old and has been managing a kiosk for more than six years. She wakes up very early each day so that she can open her business. Most of her customers are children who attend school nearby. Over time she has gradually increased her capital, so this is not the first time she has received financing.

This loan will be used to buy candy, soft drinks, bread, cookies, juices, sodas, and other items. Her dreams include seeing her three children become professionals and making certain improvements to her home.

loans.use: Operating capital to buy candy, soft drinks, bread, cookies, juices, sodas, and other items

loans.name: Ruben

texts.es: El señor Rubén es Administrador de empresas, trabaja como Consultor en una empresa, el crédito lo quiere para comprar una Laptop (Computadora portátil) para realizar su trabajo con mayor eficiencia. Es su principal fuente de ingreso para su manutención de su familia.Vive  en casa de sus padres ubicada en la zona de Miraflores de la ciudad de La Paz, está casado y tiene dos hijos. Es la Primera vez que trabaja con IMPRO y KIVA.
texts.en:
Sr. Rubén is a business manager who works for a company as a consultant. The loan he is requesting will be used to buy a laptop computer so that he can perform his work more efficiently. His job is the main source of income for supporting his family. He lives in the home of his parents, which is located in the District of Miraflores in the city of La Paz. Rubén is married and has two children.

This is his first loan with IMPRO and Kiva.

loans.use: Purchase a laptop computer to use in his job as a consultant

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es: Victoria, es una delicada y noble mujer D. 58 años. Es viuda, vive en su casa propia en compañía D. sus dos hijos D. los cinco que tiene en total, además cuida también D. su nieto Keny, D. 3 años. Victoria es pensionista, y hace 5 años trabaja en un proyecto vinculado a la crianza D. cuy y dos veces a la semana prepara menús para el comedor popular que se ubica  cerca D. su casa a cambio  le remuneran con 5 platos D. comida. Todo lo que trabaja es para su madre muy anciana y que también los comparte con su hija que es madre soltera y su nieto que esta a su cuidado. D. esta manera, trabaja en todo lo que se le presente, ya que le gusta trabajar y  D.  ese modo olvida su tristeza desD. que falleció su esposo. Además, solo así  está convencida D. progresar, y ahora que solicita este crédito, está segura D. contar con su ayuda, por ello se ha propuesto realizar todas las documentaciones D. otro terreno, para que mas adelante su hija construya su casa o D. lo contrario lo pueda vendar a mayor precio. Es su 3er crédito con MFP, siempre ha demostrado compromiso en sus anteriores créditos. Por ello,  dice “que con confíen en ella  y estén seguros que pagará D. la misma manera que los anteriores. Con el crédito que solicita, pagará la documentación y los tramites D. su otro terreno, asimismo pagar los derechos D. instalación D. agua y desagüe.
texts.en:
Victoria is 58 years old and a delicate noble woman. She is a widow who lives in her own home with two of her five children. Victoria also takes care of her three year old grandson Keny. Even though she receives a pension, Victoria has been raising guinea pigs for five years. She also prepares food twice a week at a popular diner located near home. In exchange for her work, she is allowed to bring home five plates of food. All of her work is done so that she can support her elderly mother, her daughter who is a single mother, and her grandson. Victoria will accept every job that is given to her because she enjoys working and it helps her to forget the sadness she has experienced since the death of her husband. She is convinced that her work is the only way to move forward. Now she is applying for this loan because she is confident that it will be of great help. Victoria plans to complete all of the documentation required to obtain another piece of land on which her daughter can build a house and sell later at a higher price.

This is her third loan with MFP. Victoria has always demonstrated her commitment with her previous loans. The Institution trusts her and is confident that she will repay this loan in the same manner as her previous ones. The loan she is requesting will be used to pay for the documentation and paperwork for another piece of land, as well as acquire the rights to have a water and drainage system installed.

loans.use: Complete the final payment on a piece of land & have basic services installed

loans.name: Mi Fortaleza En Cristo 2 Group

texts.es:
Romelinda es miembro del grupo Mi fortaleza en cristo 2, ella junto a otros micro-empresarios de la ciudad de Santiago, han decidido tomar prestamos para realizar diferentes actividades de negocios, son 5 empresarios con diferentes negocios, algunos venden productos, prendas de plata, ropa, zapatos, tienda de alimentos. Romelinda es madre de 2 hijos, ambos menores que aun viven con ella y su esposo.

Este es el cuarto prestamo de Romelinda  esta recibiendo su primer prestamos con Esperanza internacional, con la motivación de darle forma e iniciar su proyecto de negocio poco usual, pero a la vez innovador y pone mucha Fe en que con el podrá lograr sus sueños, uno de ellos es poder tener su propia casa, y mejorar la situación económica por la que en la actualidad se encuentran, sus ganancias la utilizara para reinvertir y llevar ingresos extra a su familia, ayudando a su esposo con los gastos, tiene 2 hijos. Gracias por su apoyo.
texts.en:
Romelinda is a member of the 'Mi Fortaleza en Cristo 2' (My Strength in Christ 2) group.  She decided to join together with other small business owners from the city of Santiago so that they could take out loans for their businesses.  The group has five members who each have different businesses.  They sell products, silver jewelry and clothes, and run a food store.  Romelinda has two grown-up children who still live with her and her husband.

This is Romelinda's fourth loan.  She is receiving her first loan with Esperanza Internacional with the intention of starting up a fairly unusual but, at the same time, innovative business project.  She is putting a lot of faith in being able to achieve her dreams through this project.  One of these dreams is to own her own home and another is to improve her current financial situation.  She will re-invest her profits and use the extra income for her family, helping her husband with their expenses.  She has two children.  Thank you for your support.

loans.use: To buy miscellaneous products

loans.name: Jenny Gisela

texts.es:
Jenny de 21 años, ella tiene una papelería. Hace años para poder mantener y pasar más tiempo con sus dos hijos comenzó a invertir dinero en papelería con ayuda de su esposo.  

Poco a poco con esfuerzo y dedicación a podido surtir su papelería. En l actualidad trabaja desde las 08h00am hasta las 20h00pm todos los días. Tiene muchas aspiraciones con su negocio por eso quiere continuar con el comprando con el préstamo papelería, cuadernos, plumas. En el futuro quiere aumentar su negocio y tener un almacén.
texts.en:
Jenny is 21 years old and manages a stationery shop. She started this business a few years ago so that she could take care of and spend more time with her two children. Jenny invested money in stationery so that she could help her husband.

Over time and with hard work and dedication, Jenny was able to stock her stationery sthop. She currently works from 8am to 8pm every day. Jenny has many aspirations for her business. She wants to use this loan to buy stationery, notebooks, and pens. In the future, she wants to expand her business and open a warehouse.

loans.use: Purchase stationery, notebooks, and pens

loans.name: Zoraida

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” CHASKA ÑAHUI”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Zoraida; ella tiene 65 años de edad, separada y tiene 4 hijos; La socia tiene su negocio de tienda de abarrotes ella vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar y leche también vende golosinas, fideos, gaseosas entre otros productos más a la vez la socia vende comida todos los domingos en las ferias gastronómicas que se realiza en la plaza de San Francisco de Cusco.  

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de más mercadería e insumos para sus negocios.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the "CHASKA ÑAHUI” community bank. The bank is located in the district of Cuzco, belonging to the province of Cuzco and departament of Cuzco.

The member is Zoraida. She is 65 years old, seperated and has 4 children.  She has a grocery store where she sells basic necessity products such as rice, suagr and milk. She also sells candies, pasta and soft drinks among other products. She sells food every Sunday in the food fairs held on San Francisco Plaza of Cuzco as well.  

The member is asking for the loan to buy more merchandise and materials for her businesses. 

The member is happy with the loan and is committed to making her payments.

loans.use: The member is asking for the loan to buy more merchandise and materials for her businesses.

loans.name: Mirlet Del Pilar

texts.es:
Milrelt U. desde que  estudiaba en el colegio ayudaba a su madre en la comercialización de productos variados y siempre le fue muy bien,  por eso no fue difícil  que a sus 16 años lograra independizarse en el negocio y conseguir sus propios clientes especialmente en la línea  de cosméticos y productos de peluquería en general, a los que progresivamente ha ido agregando electrodomésticos menores y variados,  que exhibe directamente y/o mediante guías especializadas, eso si,  todos ellos  complementario a los productos que su madre  comercializa. 
Su máximo desafío es lograr integrar su crecimiento profesional con el empresarial, porque en la actualidad se prepara profesionalmente para construír un panorama futuro  muy exitosos. Este es su primer financiamiento con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo y está aplicando a la línea de Kiva, para comprar planchas, cepillos, alicer, gorras perfumes, cremas y pulseras, esta inversión le generará aproximadamente el veinte por ciento de  utilidad,  desde el cual proyecta su crecimiento, porque  su meta es ampliar su negocio adicionando mejor infraestructura  y en el futuro  aspira  a tener su propia vivienda, por eso desde sus actuales 19 años de edad, trabaja persistentemente y con mucho entusiasmo para lograrlo.
texts.en:
After she finished her high school classes, Mirlet U. helped her mother sell various products and always did very well, so it was not difficult to manage the business on her own at the age of 16. She obtained her own customers, especially those who wanted to buy cosmetics and hair products. Mirlet added to her inventory various small appliances, which she demonstrated in person or through specialized catalogs. These products complement the merchandise being sold by her mother.

Her greatest challenge has been integrating her professional growth with her business. However, she is prepared to become a professional by building a successful outlook on her future. This is her first loan with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo as well as her first through Kiva. She will use the funds to buy irons, brushes, hair relaxers, hats, creams, and bracelets. This investment will generate approximately a 20% profit that will help her grow. Her goal is to expand her business by increasing her infrastructure. In the future, she aspires to own a home. Mirlet is currently 19 years old and works persistently and with great enthusiasm.

loans.use: Purchase irons, brushes, hair relaxers, hats, creams, and bracelets

loans.name: Las Marías Group

texts.es:
El Comité de Mujeres de nombre Las Marías, se conformó el 10 de junio del 2.008, gracias a que la presidenta del grupo, la Sra. Mary B., ya participó del programa en otro grupo anteriormente, y decidió formar su propio grupo.
La misma contactó con la asesora y logró  juntar a 17 mujeres quienes se encuentran trabajando muy a gusto ya en el 8° ciclo, en forma conjunta y solidaria.
L sra. Mary se dedica a la venta de leche, posee dos vaquitas y con ellas trata de sustentar a su humilde familia, por ello desea un crédito con el que pueda comprar otra vaca y aumentar sus ingresos y sacar a su familia de la pobreza.
Todas ellas realizan actividades para recaudar fondos, se ayudan mutuamente para llegar a los objetivos en común.
Participan activamente en las reuniones semanales y tienen un trabajo solidario impecable.
texts.en:
The “Las Marías” women’s committee was formed on June 10, 2008 thanks to the group’s President, Mrs. Mary B., who had participated previously in another group and decided to start her own.  She herself contacted the adviser and managed to get 17 women together who are now comfortably working in their 8th cycle in a unified and mutually supportive way.

Mary sells milk.  She has two little cows with which she tries to support her humble family.  This is why she needs a loan to buy another cow to increase income and move her family out of poverty.

All of them undertake activities to generate income; they help each other mutually to reach common objectives.  They participate actively in weekly meetings and they have an impeccable mutually supportive work.

loans.use: To buy dairy cows.

loans.name: Gloria Hermelinda

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” CHASKA ÑAHUI”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Gloria Hermelinda; la socia tiene 60 años de edad, casada y tiene 1 hijo; La socia trabaja a mano y maquina ella realiza servilletas, manteles para buffet y manteles para mesas entre otros más la socia realiza estos trabajos para hoteles como El Picoaga, la socia lleva ya un buen tiempo en este negocio y se sien te feliz ya que mediante este negocio ella saca a su familia adelante a veces la socia cuenta con la ayuda de su esposo al realizar estos trabajos.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de tela,hilos,cintas entre otros más para su negocio.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Gloria Hermelinda belongs to the Chaska Ñahui Communal Bank.  The bank is located in the Cusco district, Cusco province, and the Cusco department.

Gloria Hermelinda is 60 years old, married, and has one child.  She works by hand and machine making napkins, buffet tablecloths, and tablecloths for tables, among others.  She does this work for hotels like El Picoaga.  She has been in this business for a good amount of time.  She is happy that, through this business, she gets her family ahead.  Sometimes her husband helps her with these jobs.

She is requesting the loan to buy fabric, thread, and ribbons, among other things for her business.  She is happy about the loan, and she pledges to make her payments on time.

loans.use: To buy fabric, thread, and ribbons, among other things for her business

loans.name: Ricardina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” CHASKA ÑAHUI”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Ricardina; la socia tiene 54 años de edad, casada y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de comida ,la socia trabaja de forma independiente esto es uno de los motivos que le hace sentir bien ya que mediante este negocio la socia puede estar más tiempo con sus hijos, la socia vende en forma ambulatoria ella vende en el mercado de Huancaro los días sábados de feria también se va a las distintas ferias que se realiza en Cusco y en el Valle Sagrado de esta manera la socia saca a su familia adelante.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de insumos para su negocio como arroz, azúcar, leche menestras entre otros más.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Ricardina belongs to the Chaska Ñahui Communal Bank.  The bank is located in the Cusco district, Cusco province, and the Cusco department.

Ricardina is 54 years old, married, and has four children.  She alternates her daily activities with the business of selling food.  She works in an independent manner, which is one of the reasons she feels good.  Through this business she is able to spend more time with her children.  She sells in an itinerant manner at the Huancaro market on Saturday, which is the day of the fair.  Also, she goes to different fairs in Cusco and the Valle Sagrado.  That way she gets her family ahead.

She is requesting the loan to buy supplies for her business.  She will buy things like rice, sugar, milk, and vegetables, among other things.  She is happy about the loan, and she pledges to make her payments on time.

loans.use: To buy supplies for her business like rice, sugar, milk, and vegetables, among other things

loans.name: Majeedan's Group

texts.en:
Majeedan resides in Faisalabad, Pakistan’s third largest city and famous for its textile industry. She has lived there in a two-room brick house with her husband for the past 18 years.

Majeedan is 40 years old and married to A. M., who has a marble floor-grinding business. Working daily on contracts from various people for the past 10 years, he has built a good reputation based on the quality of his work.

Majeedan herself is a housewife, staying at home and dischargings her household responsibilities. She has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah on behalf of her husband to enable him to buy a new grinding machine because his current machine needs immediate replacement. Majeedan is hopeful that a new grinding machine will help her husband better complete his work and make more profits.

A regular loan user of Asasah, this is Majeedan's fourth loan application. In previous loan years, she has maintained good credit behavior and attended all meetings.

loans.use: To buy a new grinding machine for marble floor grinding business

loans.name: Percy

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “CHASKA ÑAHUI”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Percy; el tiene 75 años de edad y es casado y tiene 7 hijos; el socio es médico cirujano cesante de profesión el tiene su consultorio por el centro de la ciudad de Cusco donde aun trabaja el atiende de lunes a sábados por las tardes a todos sus pacientes que le solicitan el socio es una persona bien alegre con muchas ganas de seguir ayudando a la gente de esta forma el socio se siente muy feliz. 

El socio solicita el préstamo para la implementación de su consultorio.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos
texts.en:
The borrower is a member of the communal bank, “CHASKA ÑAHUI”; located in the district of Cusco, in the department of Cusco in the Cusco province.

The borrower is Sr. Percy, 75 years old, who is married with 7 children. He is a doctor, and unemployed surgeon, with a surgery in the center of the city of Cusco where he works afternoons from Monday to Saturday, attending to every patient that comes to see him. He is a very happy person with a strong desire to continue helping people, something which makes him feel happy. He is applying for the loan to equip his surgery. He is very happy about the loan and is committed to fulfilling the repayment schedule.

loans.use: The applicant requests a loan to equip his surgery.

loans.name: Jaimer

texts.es: Jaimer de 40 años de edad, natural del distrito de Santa Rosa, es un hombre  muy alegre y trabajador; esta casado con Ernestina de 31 años de edad y tienen 03 hermosos hijos y juntos viven en su propia casa en la comunidad de Ranramayo caserío del distrito de Santa Rosa. Jaimer, es el sostén de su familia se dedica a la agricultura, labrando la tierra desde hace 18 años. En su parcela cuenta con plantaciones de cacao y café; plantas oriundas de la zona selvática del Valle Río Apurimac; en tiempos de cosecha necesita el apoyo de la mano de jornaleros por lo que tiene que contratarlos para avanzar con las extracciones de los frutos. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cosechar los frutos de las plantas; ya que así siente que los meses de arduo trabajo le brindan como recompensa la calidad de sus frutos. Considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus productos desde la chacra hasta los centros de acopio que se encuentran en el distrito de San Francisco; lugar donde le ofrecen mejores precios por sus granos  de cacao y café. En adelante, desea comprar nuevas tierras y sembrar más plantas de cacao de manera tecnificada y así obtener cacao orgánico. Este es su décimo crédito con MFP, siente que este aporte le ayudará mucho en el progreso de su trabajo y esta dispuesto a cumplir puntualmente con sus cronogramas de pagos. Con los  3,000 nuevos soles solicitados,  contratará peones para extraer los frutos del café.
texts.en: Jaimer, 40 years old, is a happy and hardworking man who originally hails from the Santa Rosa district. He is married to Ernestina, 31 years old; they have 3 beautiful children and live together in their own home in the community of Ranramayo, a hamlet in the Santa Rosa district. Jaimer is the breadwinner for his family; he works in agriculture and has been working the land since he was 18 years old. His land contains cocoa and coffee plantations, with plants that are native to the Río Apurimac Valley woodlands. At harvest time he needs a helping hand from contracted day laborers in order to proceed with harvesting  the beans. For him, the best part of his job is harvesting the beans from the plant; a time when he feels that the quality of his beans makes the months of hard work worthwhile. He believes that the hardest part of his job is transporting his produce from the farm to the warehouses located in the district of San Francisco, where he is offered better prices for his coffee and cocoa beans. In the future, he wishes to buy new lands and sow more cocoa plants using more modern methods so that he can produce organic cocoa. This is his tenth loan with MFP; he feels that this support will greatly help him to continue with his work, and he is wiling to comply punctually with his repayment schedule. He will use the 3000 Nuevo Soles to contract workers to harvest the coffee beans.

loans.use: To employ day laborers to help him harvest coffee.

loans.name: Luz Aurora

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” CHASKA ÑAHUI”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Luz Aurora; la socia tiene 64 años de edad, casada y tiene 1 hijo; la socia de profesión es enfermera cesante ahora ella  trabaja como asistente de secretariado medico, trabaja de lunes a sábado de 9:00am hasta las 13:00pm y de 16:00pm hasta las 20:00pm en un consultorio por el centro de la ciudad,  la socia es una persona bien alegre y con muchas ganas de seguir delante y con su trabajo ella está realizando algunas mejoras en su casa ya que es algo que quería hacer.

La socia solicita el préstamo para el revestimiento de su casa.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The applicant is a member of the communal bank, ” CHASKA ÑAHUI”, located in the district of Cusco, in the department and province of Cusco.

The applicant is Sra. Luz Aurora, 64 years old, who is married with a son. She is an unemployed nurse and now works as a medical secretarial assistant. She works Monday to Saturday from 9am to 1pm, and from 4pm to 8pm in a surgery in the center of the city. She is a very happy person with a great willingness to progress and continue working. She is carrying out some improvements in her home as it is something that she wanted to do.

She is applying for the loan to redecorate her house.

She is happy about the loan and is committed to meeting her repayments.

loans.use: The applicant requests a loan to redecorate her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy ingredients.

loans.name: Fanni Rosa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” CHASKA ÑAHUI”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Fanni Rosa; la socia tiene 42 años de edad, separada y tiene 2 hijos; la socia de profesión es artista ella es cantante la socia trabaja en una de las  discotecas de la ciudad de Cusco trabaja los viernes y sábados por las noches, la socia trabaja por contrato de acuerdo a las actividades que se realizan al año, la socia es una persona bien alegre y con muchas ganas de seguir adelante por su familia 

La socia solicita el préstamo para reponer un capital que le prestaron el año pasado en el mes de diciembre para la campaña navideña y de esta manera no tener deudas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Fanni Rosa belongs to the Chaska Ñahui Communal Bank.  The bank is located in the Cusco district, Cusco province, and the Cusco department.

Fanni Rosa is 42 years old, separated, and has two children.  She is a singer by profession.  She works in one of the discotheques in the city of Cusco.  She works Friday and Saturday nights.  She works by contract according the activities that are carried out during the year.  She is a very happy person with a great desire to get ahead for her family.

She is requesting the loan to reimburse the money that was lent to her last year in December for the Christmas season.  That way she will not have that debt.  She is happy about the loan, and she pledges to make her payments on time.

loans.use: To reimburse the money that was lent to her last year in December for the Christmas season in order to no longer have that debt

loans.name: Filomena

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “CAPAC QOYA”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito D. Qoya, provincia D. Calca, Departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Filomena; La socia tiene 46 años D. edad, la socia  es casada; la socia tiene 4 hijos independientes todos ellos; La socia trabaja criando cuyes y aves D. corral, la socia también cultiva sus terrenos D. maíz, ella también produce verduras ta les como habas, lechugas, calabazas, zanahorias entre otros, ahora la socia quiere comprar cuyes para criarlos y venderlos en la ciudad; La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra D. cuyes y D. este modo incrementar su negocio y venderlos en la ciudad a un buen precio. 

La socia está feliz con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago D. sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This borrower belongs to the Capac Qoya Communal Bank. The bank is located in the Qoya District within the Calca Province and the Department of Cusco.

Filomena is 46 years old, married, and has four children who are all independent. She works raising guinea pigs and poultry. She also farms corn and grows vegetables like beans, lettuce, squash, and carrots, among others. Now Filomena wants to buy guinea pigs to raise and sell in the city. She is requesting the loan to invest in the purchase of guinea pigs so that she can expand her business and sell them in the city at a good price.

Filomena is pleased with the loan granted and promises to make her payments in the established time frame.

loans.use: To invest in the purchase of guinea pigs

loans.name: Irma Irene

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” CHASKA ÑAHUI”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Irma Irene; la socia tiene 39 años de edad, conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; la socia lleva la contabilidad de diferentes empresas que se encuentran en el medio , esta es una actividad que le gusta mucho a la socia a la vez la socia es consultora de belleza de las líneas Avon,Unique y Esika ella vende productos como cremas,colonias,perfumes,entre otros más la socia es una persona bien alegre y optimista y de esta forma la socia saca a su familia adelante y ahora que sus hijos iran al colegio ella solicita el prestamo para comprar lo que son uniformes ,cuadernos entre otros mas.

La socia solicita el préstamo para su uso personal como son los útiles escolares de sus hijos.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This borrower belongs to the Chaska Ñahui Communal Bank. The bank is located in the Cusco District, which is part of the province and department of Cusco.

Irma Irene is 39 years old, has a live-in partner, and has two children. She handles the accounting for different intermediary companies and she enjoys this work very much. At the same time, she is also a beauty consultant for Avon, Unique, and Esika. She sells products like creams, colognes and perfumes, among other items. She is a very happy and optimistic person and this is how she gets her family ahead in life. Now that her children will go to school, she is requesting the loan to buy uniforms, notebooks, and other items.

She is requesting the loan for personal use to buy school supplies for her children.

She is happy for the loan and promises to make her payments.

loans.use: To buy school supplies for her children

loans.name: Bilqees' Group

texts.en:
Bilqees lives in Faisalabad, which is Pakistan’s 3rd largest city and famous for its textile industry. She is 51 years old and married to D.. Her home is located in the area of Ghafary town and contains 2 rooms. She moved here 13 years ago. 
Her husband has a business making and selling furniture. He is very good at his art and makes quality furniture. He operates his shop in the market and displays his furniture to sell there. 
Bilqees is a house wife. She does her job very well as a wife and mother. She has a daughter and 2 sons.  Her sons left their education and started work to support the family financially. Her eldest son works with his father at his shop and is learning the art of making furniture, while her younger son is a painter by profession and paints houses and walls. Her daughter is studying in 5th grade. 

Bilqees has applied for a loan from Kiva partner, Asasah, for the betterment of her husband’s business. With the loan, he will buy a woodcutting machine and wood in large quantity to make more furniture and sell for extra profit.  Bilqees is hopeful that, by investing loan money in her husband’s business, his income will definitely grow as a result of increasing sales. 
She is a regular user of Asasah, and this is her 4th loan application. In previous loan years, she has maintained a good credit behavior and never missed any meeting.

loans.use: To buy a woodcutting machine and wood for furniture business

loans.name: Jhony

texts.es: Jhony, de 20 años de edad, natural del distrito de Anco, es un Joven muy alegre y trabajador; convive con Sarita de 18 años de edad, quien es madre gestante, lleva 8 meses de embarazo; juntos viven en su casa propia donde reina la paz  y la avenencia. Jhony, es un joven muy responsable y conocedor de su trabajo es campesino, sus padres le enseñaron este oficio desde temprana edad, desde entonces ha trabajado en su propia chacra durante 04 años y cuenta con 03 hectáreas de terreno cultivados con los siguientes productos: cacao, café y plátano. En tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de los jornaleros. Sabe muy bien que este aporte que obtiene es para producir buena calidad de frutos. Sus productos de cacao y café los comercializa  en la ciudad de San Francisco, puesto que es donde mejores precios le ofrecen por la calidad de sus granos. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cosechar los frutos, ya que así siente que los meses de arduo trabajo le brindan como recompensa la calidad de sus frutos. Considera que lo más difícil es trasladar los productos desde la cosecha hasta el punto de secado. En adelante, espera comprar nuevas tierras, y sembrar plantas de café y cacao. Este es su primer crédito con MFP, siente que este crédito le ayudará mucho en el progreso de su trabajo y esta dispuesto a cumplir puntualmente con sus cronogramas de pagos. Agradece a la institución Prisma por concederle el crédito. Con los  2,000 nuevos soles solicitados, comprará víveres para iniciar su negocio de venta de productos alimenticios.
texts.en:
Jhony, 20, is from Anco district.  He is a cheerful, hard working young man.  He cohabits with Sarita, 18, who is 8 months pregnant.  They live together in their own house where peace and concord reign.

Jhony is a very responsible young man who is very knowledgeable in his work: he’s a farmer.  His parents taught his this occupation when he was quite young and since then he’s worked his own field for the last four years.  He has three hectares producing the following crops: cocoa beans, coffee and bananas.  During harvest time he hires day laborers to help.  He is quite aware that this contribution he’s getting is to produce good quality fruit.  He sells his cocoa beans and coffee in the city of San Francisco because that’s where the best prices for these grains are available.

What he enjoys the most about his work is harvesting because that’s when the long months of hard work bear fruit in the good quality of his crops.  Transporting his products from the fields to the drying spaces is the most difficult part of the job.  For later on he’d like to purchase new fields and plant coffee and cocoa beans.

This is his first loan with MFP.  He feels the loan will help him a lot with the progress of his work and he’s willing to repay in a timely fashion.  He thanks Prisma for granting the loan.  He will use the requested 2000 new soles to buy food items to start a new business selling groceries.

loans.use: To buy food items to start a new business.

loans.name: Jorge Raúl

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “CHASKA ÑAHUI”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Jorge Raul; el tiene 39 años de edad y es separado y tiene 2 hijos; el socio trabaja en artesanía el trabaja con fibra de alpaca (tejidos) el tiene su fábrica donde reparte solo a sus clientes, el socio es una persona bien alegre y entusiasta con muchas ganas de salir adelante siendo de esta forma que el socio saca  a su familia.

El socio solicita el préstamo para la compra de más materiales para su negocio de artesanía.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos
texts.en:
Jorge Raúl is a member of the “CHASKA ÑAHUI” communal bank located in Cusco district which belongs to Cusco province, Cusco department.

He is 39 years old, separated and has two children.  He is a craftsman making woven items out of alpaca fibers.   He has a factory where he sells to customers.  He is quite a cheerful, enthusiastic person with drive to get ahead since this is the way he supports his family.

He is asking for a loan to buy more materials for his crafts business.  He is happy about the loan and commits to repay.

loans.use: To buy more materials for his crafts business.

loans.name: La Fuente De Bendicion 1 & 2 Group

texts.en:
Reina is one of our businesswomen. She works selling seafood such as squid, fish, crabs and others. She makes her sales in her community which is a rural area surrounded by forests and mountains, also near Bahia, in the town of Hato Mayor, an agricultural zone where some of her customers live and other borrowers live.

Reina has two children who still live with her, together with her long-term partner, also their father. Her most important challenge is finishing her studies. Reina is receiving her sixth loan from Esperanza Internacional and, because her loan repayments have all been maD. punctually, she has been able to grow her business with the re-investment she makes from each loan. 

She started her business 6 years ago, with some personal savings. She will buy a freezer, scales, and also a cooler to carry with her to other communities far from the Bahia. She would like to save her profits to build her house and to be able to give her children a safer home.  She also wants to become a successful businesswoman and a professional.

loans.use: to buy a cooler, a freezer and other items

loans.name: Lucy Zoraida

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” CHASKA ÑAHUI”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Lucy Zoraida; la socia tiene 42 años de edad, separada y tiene 2 hijos; la socia trabaja en el ministerio de agricultura lleva ya un buen tiempo en su trabajo ella trabaja de lunes a viernes, la socia a la vez vende productos de belleza de las líneas Avon, Unique y Esika ella vende cremas, perfumes, colonias entre otros productos más de esta manera la socia saca a su familia adelante ella es una persona bien alegre y con muchas ganas de seguir adelante.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de más productos de belleza para así tener más variedad que ofrecer a sus clientes. 

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Lucy Zoraida is a member of the “CHASKA ÑAHUI” communal bank located in Cusco district which belongs to Cusco province, Cusco department.

She is 42 years old, separated and has two children.  She works for the Ministry of Agriculture.  She’s been employed for quite some time; she works Monday through Friday.  She also sells beauty products of the Avon, Unique and Esika brands; she sells creams, perfumes and colognes, among other products.  This way she supports her family.  She is a very cheerful person with a strong wish to get ahead.

She is asking for the loan to buy more beauty products so that she can have a wider variety available for her customers.  She is happy with the loan and commits to pay every installment.

loans.use: To buy more beauty products to have a wider selection available for her customers.

loans.name: Manuel De Jesus

texts.es:
Manuel de 42 años, tiene un taller de ensamblaje y pintura de carros, vive con su esposa e hijas de 15 y 13 años. El trabajo por muchos años con un familiar que tenía un taller de enderezadora pero como quería independizarse y tener su propio negocio un taller de enderezado y pintura de carros. 

Trabaja desde las 09h00am arreglando carros destruidos por choques. Con el préstamo quiere comprar pinturas para arreglar más carros. En el futuro quiere comprar un carro para movilizarse a los lugares donde se encuentran sus clientes.
texts.en:
Manuel, 42, has a car repair and paint shop.  He lives with his wife and daughters who are 15 and 13 years of age.  He worked for many years with a family member who had a body shop but he wanted to become independent and have his own body shop and car painting business.

He works from 9am fixing cars that have been destroyed in collisions.  He will use the loan to buy paint so that he can fix more cars.  In the future he wants to buy a car so that he can go where his customers are located.

loans.use: For paint.

loans.name: Grupo Solidario Mujeres Virtuosas Group

texts.es:
Solidario Mujeres Virtuosas: El Grupo Esta Formado Por 3 Socias las cuales tienen deferentes negocios ellas son:
Graciela C. M.: Venta de comida y refacciones.
Maria Isabel R. O.: Venta de comida y venta de ropa.
Dora Marina P. A.: venta de frutas.
Graciela es viuda,tiene 3 hijos es de 75 años de edad,es la lider de este grupo, ella tiene un negocio de venta de conida y refacciones actual mente vive sola porque su esposo murio hace 15 años y debido a eso ella tubo que dedicarse al negocio para poder sacar adelante a sus hijos y que ellos sean unas personas de bien. las otras dos socias se dedican a la venta de comida y venta de frutas, las tres señoras solicitan el credito para compra de productos comestibles para elavorar comida y compra de frutas para la venta, para asi crecer en su negocio su sueños es poder mirar a su familia prosperada y tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Solidario Mujeres Virtuosas: The group is comprised of 3 members who have different businesses. They are:

Graciela C. M. sells food and vehicle spare parts.
Maria Isabel R. O. sells food and clothing.
Dora Marina P. A. sells fruit.
Graciela, 75 years old and widowed with 3 children, is the group's leader. She runs a business selling food and vehicle spare parts. Currently she lives alone as her husband died 15 years ago, due to which she runs the business in order to provide for her children and so that they will be well-regarded people. The other 2 members sell food and fruit. The 3 ladies are applying for this loan to buy food supplies to prepare meals and to buy fruit to sell so that they can grow their business. Their dream is to be able to see their families prosper and have a better quality of life.

loans.use: To purchase food supplies to prepare meals and to purchase fruit to sell.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” CHASKA ÑAHUI”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Luz Marina; la socia tiene 35 años de edad, separada y tiene 2 hijos; la socia trabaja en un salón de belleza por el centro de la ciudad ella trabaja de lunes a sábado desde las 9:00am hasta las 9:00pm la socia lleva años en este trabajo del cual se siente feliz ya que de eta manera ella saca a su familia adelante, la socia desea en el futuro aperturar su propio negocio pero por ahora ella se siente feliz trabajando así,la socia necesita el prestamo ya que se viene campaña escolar y necesita para comprar sus utiles y uniformes para asi poder tener todo en orden cuando sus hijos ingresen al colegio.

La socia solicita el préstamo para su uso personal como comprar los útiles escolares para sus hijos. 

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Luz Marina is a member of the “CHASKA ÑAHUI” communal bank located in Cusco district which belongs to Cusco province, Cusco department.  

She is 35 years old, separated and has two children.  She works in a beauty salon near downtown from Monday through Saturday, from 9am until 9pm; she’s been in this job for several years and is happy because that’s how she supports her family.

In the future she’d like to open her own business but for now she is happy working like this.  She needs a loan because the school year is about to start and she needs to buy her children’s school supplies and uniforms so that she can have everything in order when they return to school.

She is asking for a personal use loan to buy her children’s school supplies.  She is happy about the loan and commits to pay her installments.

loans.use: To buy her children's school supplies.

loans.name: Milena

texts.es:
Milena B. Martínez de 27 años de edad, vive con su cónyuge y sus dos hijos de 5 y 7 años, en el municipio de Soledad a 15 minutos  de la ciudad de Barranquilla; allí se dedica a la venta de carnes frías, de res,  vísceras , y por otro lado también  vende mercancía  como calzado y pantalones.
Para Milena  la necesidad de salir adelante con su familia y las dificultades que ella tuvo para ingresar a la vida laborar formal, impulsaron la iniciativa de  su negocio, con el que ha logrado un  trabajo  independiente y sostenible.   Ella ha recibido dos financiamientos de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, desde hace dos años y su credikiva es su tercer crédito con el cual comprará una parte en carnes frías y carne de res y la otra parte en calzado, inversión que pronostica ser exitosa pues estaría cumpliendo con pedidos de sus clientes, porque conoce su mercado y ya ha hecho su preventa, la cual le indicó hacia donde dirigir su inversión.
Milena se siente muy contenta   porque con su negocio y los financiamientos, ha logrado tener una estabilidad en sus ingresos que repercuten positivamente en su bienestar familiar. Su sueño ahora es tener una casa propia y con ella un local bien dotado, para  ubicar un  punto de comercialización de sus productos y este es justamente su gran desafío,  porque para ello requiere un capital adicional y por eso esta trabajando y haciendo esfuerzos por impactar el mercado y aumentar su venta  que en la actualidad le genera un veinte por ciento de rentabilidad.
texts.en:
Milena B. Martínez, 27, lives with her spouse and two children who are 5 and 7 years of age in the city of Soledad 15 minutes from Barranquilla.  She sells cold cuts, beef and innards and also sells merchandise like shoes and pants.

For Milena the need to get ahead with her family and the difficulties she faced in trying to enter formal employment pushed her into starting a business that has made it possible for her to work at a job that’s independent and sustainable.

She has gotten two loans from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo in the last two years and this Kiva loan is her third loan.  She will use part of it for cold cuts and beef and the other part for shoes.  She foresees the investment will be successful because she would be filling pending customer orders and she knows her market and has made presales which showed her the way to channel her investment.

Milena is very happy because with her business and the loans she has reached stability in her income that has positive repercussions on her family’s wellbeing.  Her dream now is to have a house of her own and with it a well stocked locale to find a spot to sell her products; this is her great challenge because for it she would need additional capital and this is why she’s working and making the effort to impact the market and increase sales which currently garner a 20% profit margin.

loans.use: Part for cold cuts and beef and part for shoes.

loans.name: Osman Kawusu

texts.en: This is 48 year-old Osman.  He is married and has 4 children, aged 18, 8, 5 and 3. He has 1 additional dependent, who lives with him because he is Osman's younger brother's son.  In 1996, Osman established his enamel bowl and bagged rice business. He began his business because he wanted to be self-reliant. Working 7 days a week and 10 hours a day, he earns about Le 1,486,000 every month from this business. He would like a loan in the amount of Le 4,000,000. Osman requires a loan in order to buy additional enamel and to improve his business. He hopes that this loan will enable him to increase his monthly profits by approximately Le 297,200. In the future, Osman plans to help his children with their education.   He thanks you for your support

loans.use: To buy additional enamel and bags of rice

loans.name: Gladys Noemí

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” CHASKA ÑAHUI”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Gladys Noemí; la socia tiene 33 años de edad, conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; la socia se dedica  a la compra y venta de productos secos como mana, fideos entre otros, la socia viaja al Valle Sagrado para vender sus productos también vende en Cusco pero siempre viaja por el Valle y también está en las distinta ferias dominicales, la socia a la vez vende productos de belleza como cremas, colonias, perfumes entre otros más ella es consultora de las líneas Avon y Esika. 

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de más productos  secos para su negocio y también para la compra de productos de belleza.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This borrower belongs to the Chaska Ñahui Communal Bank. The bank is located in the Cusco District, which is part of the province and department of Cusco.

Gladys Noemi is 33 years old, has a live-in partner, and has two children. She works buying and selling dried goods like nuts, pasta, and other items. She goes to Sacred Valley as well as Cusco to sell her goods, but she always travels through the valley and to different Sunday markets. Gladys Noemi also sells beauty products like creams, colognes, perfumes, etc. She is a consultant for Avon and Esika.

She is requesting the loan for the purchase of more dried goods for her business, as well as for the purchase of beauty products.

She is pleased with the loan and promises to make her payments.

loans.use: To purchase more dried goods for her business, as well as beauty products

loans.name: Margrate's Group

texts.en:
Margrate is a resident of Ghafary town, which is located in Faisalabad. Faisalabad is Pakistan’s third largest city and well known for its textile industry. Her home is a small one containing two rooms. She moved here a year ago with her family.  She is a 48-year old housewife who stays at home and does her household work. Margrate is the mother of 3 sons who work in a telecom company for a low income. 

Her husband has a business repairing shoes. He operates his business from a bazaar and is well known for his good service. He can repair every type of shoe and make it usable. Although his business requires much struggle, he is a satisfied person.
